meanings.definition: A group of chemical compounds derived from toluene.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied different toluides in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The factory produced various toluides for research purposes.
meanings.sent3: The toluides decided to throw a party in the beaker.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a mixture of thoughts, like a blend of toluides.
meanings.sent5: The smell of toluides lingered in the air, reminding her of the lab.

meanings.definition: A type of dye used in the textile industry.
meanings.sent1: The designer used vibrant toluides to color the fabric.
meanings.sent2: The company imported high-quality toluides for their clothing line.
meanings.sent3: The toluides danced on the cloth, creating a colorful pattern.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like a field of blooming toluides.
meanings.sent5: The vivid toluides transformed the plain fabric into a work of art.
